answers.answer: You need to take her to a pediatrician for an evaluation.And you should have taken her to an emergency room to be evaluated by a medical doctor after she passed out.

question: my 10 year old granddaughter passed out for about 30 seconds this morning so we took her blood pressure and tested her sugar level since diabetes runs on both sides of the family. her level was 137. i feel this is to high for a skinny 10 yr. old. what should we do?
title: 10 yr.old fainting spell
